purpose.summary: This DDL script creates a unique index named CARDDEMO.XAUTHFRD on the CARDDEMO.AUTHFRDS table. The index is defined on CARD_NUM in ascending order and AUTH_TS in descending order, enforcing uniqueness on these column combinations. It includes the COPY YES option.

inputs.name: CARDDEMO.AUTHFRDS
inputs.description: Target table on which the unique index is created

outputs.name: CARDDEMO.XAUTHFRD
outputs.description: Unique index enforcing no duplicate (CARD_NUM, AUTH_TS) combinations and supporting ordered access

business_rules.description: Enforce uniqueness on (CARD_NUM, AUTH_TS) combinations in the AUTHFRDS table
business_rules.logic_summary: Unique index prevents insertion or update of duplicate key values on the composite key

sql_operations.purpose: Enforce uniqueness on CARD_NUM and AUTH_TS combinations while providing efficient access ordered by card number ascending and authorization timestamp descending
